text: Tommy Sale (21 July 1918 - 3 January 2016) was an English rugby league player. He played for Leigh Centurions and Widnes Vikings. He later coached Leigh. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2016 deaths Category:English rugby league players Category:Rugby league coaches Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:People from Wigan
title: Tommy Sale (rugby league)
